summary: This document is a collection of suicide watch observation logs and related records for inmate Jeffrey Edward Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. It covers the period from July 6, 2019, to July 24, 2019, documenting the 5-minute observations of Epstein while on suicide watch, including the day he was found dead.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the suicide watch logs; listed as inmate register number 176318-054 at MCC New York.

events.title: Suicide watch begins
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is placed on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: Suicide watch ended
events.description: Epstein's suicide watch is officially ended at 0140 hours.

events.title: Epstein found dead
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is found dead in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch from July 6, 2019, to July 23, 2019, at 0140 hours.
The logs document 5-minute observational checks of Epstein while he was on suicide watch.
Epstein's inmate register number was 176318-054, and he was categorized as a Federal Prisoner (FEW).
The suicide watch was officially ended on July 23, 2019, and Epstein was found dead on July 24, 2019.
The observation logs contain handwritten entries that are largely illegible, but they are standard procedure for monitoring inmates on suicide watch.
